Question
========

At a fixed significance level of 5% and an increase in number of subjects, then

Answerlist
----------

* The power increases and the Type I error decreases.
* Power decreases and Type II error decreases.
* Increases the power and decreases the Type II error.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Increases the power and decreases the Type I error...: Incorrect
* Power decreases and Type II error decreases...: Incorrect
* Power increases and Type II error decreases...: Correct
